title: Data Entry
description: Online part time work for a confidential project. Great opportunity to work with a full time college schedule.

title: IT Technician
description: Built a project tracking tool on the organization’s intranet using HTML/CSS, JS, PHP and MariaDB. The tool allows anadministrator to add projects and data such as budgets, start dates and deadlines, and visualizes the data in multipletypes of graphs to aid in decision making. Set up and maintained a CentOS web server.

title: IT Technician
description: Assisted in the second revamp of the organization’s web site by remodeling the front-end. Coded multiple bash scripts to automate data fetching jobs. Produced documentation for business processes.

title: IT Technician
description: Aided in the revision of the organization’s entire web site; handled data migration and front-end development. Rewrote obsolete documentation for the department’s software and servers.
